LanguageData.SnakeVenomCure1.label: snake venom healing vapours
LanguageData.SnakeVenomCure1.description: Allows the construction of a snake venom cure through the use of healing vapours. This is a less advanced version of the antivenom and a lot more expensive.
LanguageData.SnakeVenomCure2.label: snake venom antivenom
LanguageData.SnakeVenomCure2.description: Allows the construction of snake venom antivenoms a cheaper version of snake venom healing vapours, just in case one of your colonists get bitten...
LanguageData.MegaSpiderCure1.label: megaspider paralysis antivenom
LanguageData.MegaSpiderCure1.description: Allows the construction of megaspider paralysis antivenoms in machining tables through the process of giving snake venom controlled electric shocks in order to change the arrangement of certain molecules.
LanguageData.MegaSpiderCure2.label: extraction of venom glands from megaspiders
LanguageData.MegaSpiderCure2.description: Allows the removal of venom glands from megaspiders in butcher tables offering an easier way to get the megaspider paralysis antivenom.
